price: 57. Woo mattaccoo ku-Rabbi-le qaxak keenih kaxxa muxxo kinni, woo niqmat usuk kaxxa affaafa.
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbika dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
